channel.title: [508] Bloodscape - Dclaws, Dplate and more! [508]
channel.description:
[center]A project ive been working on for a while. This is not the full release, if you are a decent coder and are interested in helping to improve the server, shoot me a message.
FEATURES: minigames: Basic Godwars with bandos boss and zammy boss. Bigboss, which is the source of rares in the server, with drops that are rare, so they keep the economy balanced. Fight pits
Grand exchange Claws D plate All skills working
TRADE DOES WORK 90%
CUSTOM FOLLOWERS: ids are from 1436 to 1446 drop the items (pure essence or talismans)
Npcs drop cash depending on their levels
Decent economy
Downloads: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?dyvx51ea7goa06q]Server[/url] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?befxzznu02u4426]Client[/url] [/center] HOWTO change the ip on the client:
1) Create a new plain text file with any name, naming the extension .bat or .cmd (your choice).
2) Paste this code into the file you just created. [code=dos] @echo off cd files "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause [/code] 3) Replace the jdk version with yours
4) go into files-> client.java and search for this [code=java] Class75_Sub2.aBoolean3314 = false; [/code]
5) right below it should be the current ip
6) set it to what you want, save, and compile with the file we made.
[center]
Some of these pictures are outdated, will post new ones soon enough... [img]http://i567.photobucket.com/albums/ss114/sig00/runecrafting.png[/img] [img]http://i567.photobucket.com/albums/ss114/sig00/bluephat.png[/img]
